p: The cytotoxicity was graded according to the LC 50 value (high cytotoxicity: LC 50 <100 μg/mL, moderate cytotoxicity: LC 50 >100-<200 μg/mL, and potentially no cytotoxicity: LC 50 >200 μg/mL). In turn, leishmanicidal activity was graded according to the EC 50 or IC 50 value (high activity: EC 50 <20 μg/mL, moderate activity: EC 50 >20-<50 μg/mL, and potentially non-activity: EC 50 >100 μg/mL).
